comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message about password requirements when users enter or edit their passwords. It informs users that their password must meet certain criteria, such as length and complexity, and appears in password input fields and validation tooltips throughout the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation "Şifrədə olmalıdır" is a literal translation of "must contain" and doesn't convey the full meaning. It would be better to translate it as something like "Şifrənin olmalıdır" or "Şifrəyə daxil edilməlidir".
The translation "パスワードには、以下が含まれていなければなりません。" is a very formal and somewhat unnatural way to express 'Password must contain'. It literally translates to 'The password must contain the following.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワードには、以下の条件が含まれていなければなりません。(Password must contain the following conditions)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: A more natural and concise translation would be preferable. The current translation is overly verbose for a password requirement message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワードには、～を含める必要があります。(Password must include ~)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation is too literal. It translates to "Password must necessarily contain the following:". A more natural and user-friendly translation would be "Password must include" or "Password needs to include".

The translation 'Parolei ir jāsatur' is a literal translation of 'Password must contain' but doesn't convey the full meaning in a natural way. A more natural translation would emphasize the requirement.

The translation 'A palavra-chave tem de conter' is a literal translation but not the most natural or user-friendly way to communicate this message. It's more accurate to convey the requirement, not simply state that the password *has* to contain something.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'A senha deve conter' or 'A senha precisa conter'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මුරපදයේ අඩංගු විය යුතුයි' (Murapadaye adanguyu viyuytai) literally translates to 'Must be contained in the password'.  A more natural and accurate translation of 'Password must contain' would be something like 'මුරපදය තුල තිබිය යුතුයි' (Murapadaya thula thibiya yuthai) or 'මුරපදය තුල විය යුතුයි' (Murapadaya thula viya yuthai).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මුරපදය තුල තිබිය යුතුයි (Murapadaya thula thibiya yuthai)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Şifre şunları içermelidir" is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of "Password must contain". It implies a list of requirements rather than a general statement.
